page.title: 17BRECK'S STRAWBERRY FIELD.
page.content: Brecks farm is situated on the side of the A63 west of Hambleton.They own 14 acres of Strawberries,1/2 acre of Raspberries,1/4 Goosberries,7 1/4 acres of car park.The business started in 1980 and they didn't start selling the fruit until 1981.The busiest day is Sunday 2:00_4:00pm. The place is open 4_5 weeks a year.They sell 2 types of Strawberries they are Cambridge Favourite and Gorrella.They sell 1.5 to 2.0 tons per acre of Strawberries.The price of the fruit this year is;Strawberries 32pence,Raspberries 40 pence goosberries 25pence.The people come from Hambleton,Thorpe Willoughby, Brayton and Selby."The weather has been bad this year but the fruit is good."said Mrs.Atkinson,the owner.
